text: The Pipidae is a family of frogs. They do not have tongues. There are over 30 species of Pipidae frogs. They are found in tropical places in South America and Africa. == Genera == Family Pipidae * Hymenochirus - Dwarf clawed frogs * Pseudhymenochirus - Merlin's clawed frog * Xenopus - Common clawed frogs * Silurana - Tropical clawed frogs * Pipa - Surinam toads == References == * * * ==Other websites== Category:Frogs of South America Category:Frogs of Africa
title: Pipidae
